description:
Colombia’s prosecution formally charged former President Alvaro Uribe with fraud and witness manipulation on Friday. According to the prosecution, Uribe ordered associates to bribe witnesses in order to sabotage criminal…

title: Colombia’s prosecution charges Uribe with fraud and bribery

description:
Authorities reported an uprising inside the La Modelo prison in Colombia’s capital Bogota hours after the assassination of its director. The escalation of violence highlight increasingly violent tensions between Colombia’s…

title: Prison violence escalates in Colombia’s capital Bogota
